summary: RockPaperShotgun Founder Claimed Cyberpunk 2020 Creator Mike Pondsmith Made "A Bad Argument Regarding Racist Tropes"
title: RockPaperShotgun Founder Claimed Cyberpunk 2020 Creator Mike Pondsmith Made "A Bad Argument Regarding Racist Tropes"
body:
RockPaperShotgun Founder Claimed Cyberpunk 2020 Creator Mike Pondsmith Made “A Bad Argument Regarding Racist Tropes”

The founder of video game news site RockPaperShotgun was quick to double-down on the accusations of racism published by the website before ultimately issuing an apology and deleting his tweets.

Last week, amidst the flurry and excitement of the annual E3 expo, RockPaperShotgun staff writer Matt Cox was able to have a chance to play the latest demo for CD Projekt Red’s highly anticipated Cyberpunk…

View On WordPress

summary: Cyberpunk 2077, potrebbe arrivare il trofeo "You're breathtaking"
title: Cyberpunk 2077, potrebbe arrivare il trofeo "You're breathtaking"
body:
New Post has been published on https://www.tecnoandroid.it/2019/06/20/cyberpunk-2077-potrebbe-arrivare-il-trofeo-youre-breathtaking-543247

Cyberpunk 2077, potrebbe arrivare il trofeo “You’re breathtaking”

L’E3 2019 è stato un evento unico e sicuramente verrà ricordato nei prossimi anni per il panel dedicato agli sviluppatori di Cyberpunk 2077. Durante la presentazione Microsoft, i ragazzi di CD Projekt Red hanno deciso di far impazzire tutti i videogiocatori, mostrando il primo trailer del gioco. Alla fine del filmato c’è stata una seconda sorpresa con l’arrivo sul palco di Keanu Reevs.

Il famoso attore infatti, ha prestato volto e voce a Johnny Silverhand, una figura chiave all’interno del mondo di Cyberpunk 2077. Averlo in carne ed ossa sul palco dell’E3 ha mandato in visibilio i fan ed in particolare un ragazzo ha urlato a Keanu Reevs la seguente frase: “You’re breathtaking” traducibile con “Sei mozzafiato”.

Con la maestria da attore e intrattenitore, Keanu Reevs ha risposto al ragazzo con la sua stessa frase e l’ha estesa a tutto il pubblico scatenando un boato di approvazione. Di seguito riportiamo il video del simpatico siparietto.

Lo scambio di battute è presto diventato virale in rete, tanto che gli utenti si sono mobilitati per fare una precisa richiesta agli sviluppatori di Cyberpunk 2077. Sulla piattaforma Change.org è stata pubblicata una nuova petizione pubblica per chiedere a CD Projekt Red di inserire un particolare trofeo all’interno del gioco.

Il completamento al 100% del titolo, secondo il promotore, dovrebbe sbloccare la ricompensa “You’re Breathtaking”. Al momento in cui si sta scrivendo, hanno firmato oltre 27 mila persone e l’obiettivo di 35 mila perse sembra abbondantemente alla portata. Considerando che la richiesta non è assolutamente difficile da esaudire, si spera che i ragazzi di CD Projekt Red possano accogliere con piacere questa proposta e rendere Cyberpunk 2077 un po più mozzafiato.

blog.name: space-collector-void
blog.title: Stop sending me death threats
blog.description: I'm 16. please leave me alone. if you want to talk, dm me. anon is off

body:
Its my post

Its my post, with my own opinion, with sources I found, and with an image i edited

I don’t deserve: death threats, suicide baiting, sexual tags, rude comments, and insulting names.

I stand by what i said in the post, and there is little to nothing someone can say that will change my mind about it. And I know there is little to nothing that I can say to change the minds of people who disagree with me.

But if a literal meme that I made about people being distracted by keanu and not acknowledging the fact that there is racism and transphobia (whether it is going to change in the game or not) in cyberpunk causes you to be an asshole then you need to take a step back and think for a moment if it is worth YOUR time to try and convince me why I’m wrong.

To Spanish speaking followers/fans of CP2077:

Recordad que este blog acepta envíos y confesiones en español, así que si os resulta más fácil así mandadme vuestras ideas y yo las traduciré al inglés para los demás!

Espero que lo paséis bien en mi blog - Mod J

summary: I just like to say, I love Cyberpunk 2077. And I’m with it to the end. It’s amazing what’s it doing and I can’t wait to play it...
body:
I just like to say, I love Cyberpunk 2077. And I’m with it to the end. It’s amazing what’s it doing and I can’t wait to play it myself. And just Some people today just got so upset over everything little thing.

And By the way, Mike Pondsmith is incredible and has made an amazing world and I wish to see more of it.

And By the way, Mike Pondsmith is incredible and has made an amazing world and I wish to see more of it.

summary: Whoops my hand slipped. I conceptualized my version of V. Codenamed Apex V so I can distinguish him from the other V’s when the...
caption: Whoops my hand slipped. I conceptualized my version of V. Codenamed Apex V so I can distinguish him from the other V’s when the game comes out lol. Once I get my hands on the character creator I’ll tweak his design but this is basically what he’ll look like.
